org.opends.server.replication.service

Class DSRSShutdownSync

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.replication.service.DSRSShutdownSync

  • public class DSRSShutdownSync
extends Object
    Class useful for the case where DS/RS instances are collocated inside the same JVM. It synchronizes the shutdown of the DS and RS sides.

    More specifically, it ensures a ReplicaOfflineMsg sent by the DS is relayed/forwarded by the collocated RS to the other RSs in the topology before the whole process shuts down.

    Since:
    OPENDJ-1453
